summary: A play within a play within a play within a play. Actors perform a play in a house, an audience member invites them to work in his own home improvising a play around his own life. The line between fiction and reality blur.
cast: Jane Birkin|Geraldine Chaplin|André Dussollier|Isabelle Linnartz|Sandra Montaigu|László Szabó|Eva Roelens|Facundo Bo|Jean-Pierre Kalfon|Pascal Bonitzer|Barbet Schroeder
title: El amor por tierra
